arts.ttl: Inter Player Ratings vs Parma: Complacent Nerazzurri Held at Tardini
arts.sum: Inter squandered a two-goal cushion in Saturday's 2-2 draw at Parma, throwing a dent into their Serie A title hopes. What seemed to be another day in the office for Simone Inzaghi's side turned into a nightmare as they left Stadio Ennio Tardini with a point. The post Inter Player Ratings vs Parma: Complacent Nerazzurri Held at Tardini appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Marcus Thuram bags bizarre goal as Inter Milan concedes draw at Parma
arts.sum: His goal extended Inter Milan’s lead to 2-0 by halftime at Parma but the Serie A front-runner couldn’t hold it and ended up drawing 2-2 on Saturday. Another substitute helped Parma turn the match around completely nine minutes later when Jacob Ondrejka’s effort was deflected past Sommer.

arts.ttl: Inter travel to Parma to extend their lead
arts.sum: Inter are unbeaten in their last six league matches against Parma (W4 D2), with the last win for the Ducali against the Nerazzurri in Serie A dating back to 15 September 2018: 1-0 at the Meazza, with Federico Dimarco`s first goal of the tournament. The 18 matches played in Serie A since 2000 at the Tardini between Parma and Inter are balanced: seven wins each and four draws; the Nerazzurri have however won the last three away matches against the Ducali in the league.
